backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no persistent backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing the update to the SuccessModal message and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and animations for floral, floating, and celebratory effects.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting the page root and title 'Siddharth'.
frontend/README.md: Developer guide explaining how to change the browser tab title and notes about title management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping ValentinePage with ThemeProvider.
Animated floating image component with randomized positions, sway effects, and floral-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with a pulsing heart icon.
frontend/src/components/SparkleBurst.tsx: Creates an 8‑sparkle radial burst animation at a given screen position.
frontend/src/components/SuccessModal.tsx: Success modal showing the updated tulip message and animated falling white‑floral confetti.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook managing authenticated or anonymous backend actor instances and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH custom color variables with Valentine-themed utilities and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Implements the interactive Valentine page with background preloading, floating decorative elements, music toggling, and Yes/No interaction logic with sparkle effects.
frontend/src/utils/assetDiagnostics.ts: Checks availability of critical image assets at runtime and logs successes or failures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color mappings, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains the project's state, requirements, feature definitions, and architectural notes for the interactive Valentine flow.
